alert.note: Alert for Penobscot; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 2:21PM EDT until May 22 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Northwestern Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 221 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Kokadjo, or 12 miles southwest of Ripogenus, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Millinocket, Frenchtown, southwestern Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Baxter State Park and Beaver Cove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
